Ciao! I'm Antonio. I like beers food and Travelling, and I wannabe cook.

Hello there! I'm Antonio, an italian nice guy living in Holland , in the beautiful city of Utrecht, Delft. I work with smart people in order make the web a better place. I previously lived in Barcelona and I'm a big fan of Barca. I have 3 handsome nephews and a beautiful family. I didn't vote and I am a happy expat.
